# Chemicals for Medical
As a member of the [color=#5b97bc]Medical[/color] department, these are often the first things you'll be making in a shift.
## Basics
These are the basic set of chemicals any [color=#5b97bc]Medical[/color] ward should have.
### Basic Healing Chemicals
### Basic Stabilization Chemicals
### Other Basic Chemicals
## Others
These chemicals are harder to make and for less common types of injuries, but are still necessary for a [color=#5b97bc]Medical[/color] ward to efficiently treat people.
## Cryogenics
These chemicals are important for the usage of [color=cyan]Cryo Pods[/color], and are relatively easy to produce.
## Advanced Chemicals
These chemicals focus on one damage type only, but do a particularly good job at it.
